Description:
Detects base64 encoded strings used in hidden malicious PowerShell command lines

Author: John Lambert (rule)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Malicious Base64 Encoded PowerShell Keywords in Command Lines
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((process_path="*\\powershell.exe" OR process_path="*\\pwsh.exe") (original_file_name="PowerShell.EXE" OR original_file_name="pwsh.dll")) command="* hidden *" (command="*AGkAdABzAGEAZABtAGkAbgAgAC8AdAByAGEAbgBzAGYAZQByA*" OR command="*aXRzYWRtaW4gL3RyYW5zZmVy*" OR command="*IAaQB0AHMAYQBkAG0AaQBuACAALwB0AHIAYQBuAHMAZgBlAHIA*" OR command="*JpdHNhZG1pbiAvdHJhbnNmZX*" OR command="*YgBpAHQAcwBhAGQAbQBpAG4AIAAvAHQAcgBhAG4AcwBmAGUAcg*" OR command="*Yml0c2FkbWluIC90cmFuc2Zlc*" OR command="*AGMAaAB1AG4AawBfAHMAaQB6AGUA*" OR command="*JABjAGgAdQBuAGsAXwBzAGkAegBlA*" OR command="*JGNodW5rX3Npem*" OR command="*QAYwBoAHUAbgBrAF8AcwBpAHoAZQ*" OR command="*RjaHVua19zaXpl*" OR command="*Y2h1bmtfc2l6Z*" OR command="*AE8ALgBDAG8AbQBwAHIAZQBzAHMAaQBvAG4A*" OR command="*kATwAuAEMAbwBtAHAAcgBlAHMAcwBpAG8Abg*" OR command="*lPLkNvbXByZXNzaW9u*" OR command="*SQBPAC4AQwBvAG0AcAByAGUAcwBzAGkAbwBuA*" OR command="*SU8uQ29tcHJlc3Npb2*" OR command="*Ty5Db21wcmVzc2lvb*" OR command="*AE8ALgBNAGUAbQBvAHIAeQBTAHQAcgBlAGEAbQ*" OR command="*kATwAuAE0AZQBtAG8AcgB5AFMAdAByAGUAYQBtA*" OR command="*lPLk1lbW9yeVN0cmVhb*" OR command="*SQBPAC4ATQBlAG0AbwByAHkAUwB0AHIAZQBhAG0A*" OR command="*SU8uTWVtb3J5U3RyZWFt*" OR command="*Ty5NZW1vcnlTdHJlYW*" OR command="*4ARwBlAHQAQwBoAHUAbgBrA*" OR command="*5HZXRDaHVua*" OR command="*AEcAZQB0AEMAaAB1AG4Aaw*" OR command="*LgBHAGUAdABDAGgAdQBuAGsA*" OR command="*LkdldENodW5r*" OR command="*R2V0Q2h1bm*" OR command="*AEgAUgBFAEEARABfAEkATgBGAE8ANgA0A*" OR command="*QASABSAEUAQQBEAF8ASQBOAEYATwA2ADQA*" OR command="*RIUkVBRF9JTkZPNj*" OR command="*SFJFQURfSU5GTzY0*" OR command="*VABIAFIARQBBAEQAXwBJAE4ARgBPADYANA*" OR command="*VEhSRUFEX0lORk82N*" OR command="*AHIAZQBhAHQAZQBSAGUAbQBvAHQAZQBUAGgAcgBlAGEAZA*" OR command="*cmVhdGVSZW1vdGVUaHJlYW*" OR command="*MAcgBlAGEAdABlAFIAZQBtAG8AdABlAFQAaAByAGUAYQBkA*" OR command="*NyZWF0ZVJlbW90ZVRocmVhZ*" OR command="*Q3JlYXRlUmVtb3RlVGhyZWFk*" OR command="*QwByAGUAYQB0AGUAUgBlAG0AbwB0AGUAVABoAHIAZQBhAGQA*" OR command="*0AZQBtAG0AbwB2AGUA*" OR command="*1lbW1vdm*" OR command="*AGUAbQBtAG8AdgBlA*" OR command="*bQBlAG0AbQBvAHYAZQ*" OR command="*bWVtbW92Z*" OR command="*ZW1tb3Zl*")
